TopicTitle: When is KSP supporting borderless window mode?

Articles.Content:
I'd really like to know this. It annoys me so much to have to add -popupwindow to the shortcuts.

Also, one thing, why does the x64 version of KSP bugs out my PC? like, when I have it open, I can't click on anything besides the icon on the toolbar (using win 8.1 x64).

If you launch the game via the launcher, you can simply tick the borderless window option under advanced settings. Last time I talked to Harvester about this it was concluded that this was the only way of doing it until Unity changes.
